Penthouse awnings

Unlike other models, penthouse awnings have a light and resistant aluminum structure to support the canopy. The structure can be installed on the ground, on a railing or a wall.
The ability to cover outdoor spaces, including large ones, makes penthouse awnings ideal for protecting terraces, courtyards, and store and business patios.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”in_container” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default”
